item.title: Doom Raiders
item.description: Summary An adventuring party not unlike the Trollskull crew After raiding every dungeon they could, they founded a mercenary compamy named the Black Network Eventually, they allied themselves with Manshoon leading to the Black Network’s transformation in to the Zhentarim Key Members Left to right in the image below:

item.title: Factions
item.description: Doom Raiders An ex-adventuring party turned mercenary group turned gang generals turned unlikely allies to the party Primary Goal: Escape the Manshoon’s influence and settle down safely Members Istrid Horn Sought out the party for help after being betrayed by Skeemo Weirdbottle Skeemo Weirdbottle Betrayed the Doom Raiders, killed Davil Starsong (Deceased) and helped Manshoon assassinate the Open Lord Larael Silverhand Tashlyn Yafeera Ziraj the Hunter Davil Starsong (Deceased) Force Gray The elite group of magical and non-magical scholars and warriors led by the Blackstaff Vajra Safahr and tasked with defending Waterdeep Primary Goal: Defend the city by any means necessary.

item.title: Force Gray
item.description: Summary Led by Vajra Safahr - the Blackstaff,

item.title: Zhentarim
item.description: Summary A mercenary company turned gang that the Doom Raiders helped Manshoon found to fund his extremely expensive magical experiments
